Title: Establishes a Black youth suicide prevention task force
Summary: Establishes a Black youth suicide prevention task force to study the current mental health practices and suicide prevention of Black youth age 5 through 18 years and make recommendations therefor; provides for the number of members, manner of appointment and the topics to be reviewed.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a Black youth suicide prevention task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
